title: Why doesn't honor 3 does show every time
body: I have honor 3, but it doesn't show every time in the loading screen. How to fix

replies.body: If you're referring to those fancy little Honor Flairs on the loading screen, those will only show up for the very next game. In order to activate it again, you need to get 2 honors from premade teammates or 1 honor from a random teammate.
